MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH5 postcode area of Sealand, Deeside affecting properties in Weighbridge Road, Deeside Industrial Estate and the surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected  because our engineers on site are testing cables in order to locate the fault. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:30AM on 6th January 2021
